tweet: Voted NO today on the #ExIm Bank bill. I’ve always been supportive of the Bank’s mission, but this partisan bill includes a bundle of unnecessary provisions that distract from the Bank’s ability to ensure U.S. businesses remain competitive. Full statement: https://bit.ly/2XscqUV
